>> Kryzoid - A very long fart in front of a large audience, that forces others around you to move. Generally talked about a demonstration or large meeting, where there are multiple presenters that must move due to the smell. 
Seems about right to me.  Why'd you wait so long to ask?  It could've even been someone who quit and now you'll never know.
